scopes.name: $XSAPPNAME.routing_html5_repo_runtime
scopes.description: Allow routing to HTML5 Application Repo

scopes.name: $XSAPPNAME.one_api_basic_read
scopes.description: READ certain entities (basic ones) in one_api server

scopes.name: $XSAPPNAME.one_api_basic_write
scopes.description: WRITE certain entities (basic ones) in one_api server

scopes.name: $XSAPPNAME.one_api_admin
scopes.description: READ and WRITE all entities in one_api server

scopes.name: $XSAPPNAME.two_api_basic_read
scopes.description: READ certain entities (basic ones) in two_api server

scopes.name: $XSAPPNAME.two_api_basic_write
scopes.description: WRITE certain entities (basic ones) in two_api server

scopes.name: $XSAPPNAME.two_api_admin
scopes.description: READ and WRITE all entities in two_api server

role-templates.name: one_api_basic_reader
role-templates.description: READ certain entities (basic ones) in one_api server

role-templates.name: one_api_basic_editor
role-templates.description: READ and WRITE certain entities (basic ones) in one_api server

role-templates.name: one_api_admin
role-templates.description: READ and WRITE all entities in one_api server

role-templates.name: two_api_basic_reader
role-templates.description: READ certain entities (basic ones) in two_api server

role-templates.name: two_api_basic_editor
role-templates.description: READ and WRITE certain entities (basic ones) in two_api server

role-templates.name: two_api_admin
role-templates.description: READ and WRITE all entities in two_api server
